com.apriori.concurrent.scheduler

Interface RepeatingScheduledTask<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of value returned upon completion of the task
    All Superinterfaces:
    Awaitable, Cancellable, Comparable<Delayed>, Delayed, Future<V>, ListenableFuture<V>, ListenableRepeatingFuture<V>, ListenableScheduledFuture<V>, ScheduledFuture<V>

    public interface RepeatingScheduledTask<V>
extends ListenableRepeatingFuture<V>
    Represents a repeating task. Canceling a repeating task will cancel all future occurrences of the task. This future will not complete until canceled or the last invocation of the task completes. The latter usually occurs when an invocation fails and causes future occurrences to be aborted.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the task definition for which this task was created.
